original_text: When those people first lived in Samaria, they did not worship the Lord. So the Lord sent lions among them. The lions were killing some of the people.
korean_text: 그들이 처음으로 거기 거주할 때에 여호와를 경외하지 아니하므로 여호와께서 사자들을 그들 가운데에 보내시매 몇 사람을 죽인지라

sentences.original_text: When those people first lived in Samaria
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들이 처음 사마리아에 살았을 때

sentences.original_text: they did not worship the Lord
So the Lord sent lions among them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 주께서 그들 가운데 사자들을 보내셨다

sentences.original_text: The lions were killing some of the people
